description: A tool for team collaboration and knowledge management.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_ADD_CONTENT_LABEL
capabilities.description: Tool to add labels to a piece of content. Use after obtaining the content ID to tag pages or blog posts with metadata labels.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_CREATE_BLOGPOST
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new Confluence blog post. Use when you need to publish content in a specific space.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_CREATE_BLOGPOST_PROPERTY
capabilities.description: Tool to create a property on a specified blog post. Use when you need to add custom metadata to a blog post. Creates a new property with a key-value pair on a specified Confluence blog post. This allows users to add custom metadata relevant to the blog post.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_CREATE_CONTENT_PROPERTY_FOR_WHITEBOARD
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new content property on a whiteboard. Use when you need to attach custom metadata to a Confluence whiteboard.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_CREATE_PAGE
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new Confluence page in a specified space. Use when you need to create new documentation or content.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_CREATE_PAGE_PROPERTY
capabilities.description: Tool to create a property on a Confluence page. Use when you need to add custom metadata or settings to a page.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_CREATE_PRIVATE_SPACE
capabilities.description: Tool to create a private Confluence space. Use when you need an isolated workspace viewable only by its creator.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_CREATE_SPACE
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new Confluence space. Use when setting up a new knowledge area for organization.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_CREATE_SPACE_PROPERTY
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new property on a Confluence space. Use after confirming the space ID when adding custom metadata.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_CREATE_WHITEBOARD
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new Confluence whiteboard. Use when you need to start a collaborative whiteboard session.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_DELETE_BLOGPOST_PROPERTY

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_DELETE_CONTENT_PROPERTY_FOR_PAGE_BY_ID
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a content property from a page by property ID. Use when you need to remove custom metadata from a page for cleanup or auditing. This action deletes a specified content property from a Confluence page using its page ID and property ID. It is useful for removing outdated or unnecessary metadata.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_DELETE_CONTENT_PROPERTY_FOR_WHITEBOARD_BY_ID
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a content property from a whiteboard by property ID. Use when you need to remove custom metadata from a whiteboard.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_DELETE_PAGE
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a Confluence page. Use with caution as this will permanently remove the page from the space.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_DELETE_SPACE
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a Confluence space by its key. Use when you need to permanently remove a space.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_DELETE_SPACE_PROPERTY
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a space property. Use when you need to remove a property from a Confluence space after review.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_ATTACHMENT_LABELS
capabilities.description: Tool to list labels on an attachment. Use after confirming the attachment ID to fetch its labels.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_ATTACHMENTS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve attachments of a Confluence page. Use after confirming page ID to list its attachments (supports pagination).

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_AUDIT_LOGS

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_BLOGPOST_BY_ID

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_BLOGPOST_LABELS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve labels of a specific Confluence blog post by ID. Use after obtaining the blog post ID to list its labels.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_BLOGPOST_LIKE_COUNT
capabilities.description: Tool to get like count for a Confluence blog post. Use after confirming the blog post ID to retrieve total likes.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_BLOGPOST_OPERATIONS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve permitted operations for a Confluence blog post. Use after confirming the blog post ID to see allowed actions.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_BLOG_POSTS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a list of blog posts. Use when you need a paginated list of Confluence blog posts.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_BLOG_POSTS_FOR_LABEL

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_BLOGPOST_VERSION_DETAILS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve details for a specific version of a blog post. Use when you have a blogpostId and versionNumber and need detailed metadata for that version.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_BLOGPOST_VERSIONS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve all versions of a specific blog post. Use when you have a blogpostId and need to list version numbers.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_CHILD_PAGES
capabilities.description: Tool to list all direct child pages of a given Confluence page. Use when you have a parent page ID and need to discover its direct descendants.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_CONTENT_PROPERTIES_FOR_BLOG_POST
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve all content properties on a blog post. Use when you need to list metadata properties set on a specific Confluence blog post.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_CONTENT_PROPERTIES_FOR_PAGE
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve all content properties on a page. Use when you need to list metadata properties set on a specific Confluence page.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_CONTENT_RESTRICTIONS

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_CURRENT_USER
capabilities.description: Tool to get information about the currently authenticated user. Use when you need to check user details or permissions.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_INLINE_COMMENTS_FOR_BLOG_POST
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve inline comments for a Confluence blog post. Use when you need inline comment details by blog post ID.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_LABELS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve all labels in a Confluence site. Use when you need to list or page through labels.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_LABELS_FOR_PAGE
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve labels of a specific Confluence page by ID. Use after obtaining the page ID to list its labels.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_LABELS_FOR_SPACE
capabilities.description: Tool to list labels on a space. Use when you need to retrieve labels for a specific space.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_LABELS_FOR_SPACE_CONTENT
capabilities.description: Tool to list labels on all content in a space. Use when you need to retrieve or filter content labels by space, with pagination and optional prefix filtering.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_PAGE_ANCESTORS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve all ancestors for a given Confluence page by its ID. Use when you need the full page hierarchy.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_PAGE_BY_ID
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a Confluence page by its ID. Use when you have a page ID and need its detailed metadata and content.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_PAGE_LIKE_COUNT
capabilities.description: Tool to get like count for a Confluence page. Use after confirming the page ID to retrieve total likes.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_PAGES
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a list of pages. Use when you need a paginated list of Confluence pages.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_PAGE_VERSIONS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve all versions of a specific Confluence page. Use after confirming the page ID to audit its edit history.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_SPACE_BY_ID
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a Confluence space by its ID. Use when you need detailed metadata of a specific space.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_SPACE_CONTENTS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve content in a Confluence space. Use when you need to list pages, blogposts, or attachments of a specific space key.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_SPACE_PROPERTIES
capabilities.description: Tool to get properties of a Confluence space. Use when you need to retrieve custom metadata or settings stored as space properties.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_SPACES
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a list of Confluence spaces. Use when you need a paginated list of spaces with optional filtering.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_USER_ANONYMOUS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve information about the anonymous user. Use when you need to obtain guest user details before unauthenticated interactions.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_SEARCH_CONTENT
capabilities.description: Searches for content by filtering pages from the Confluence v2 API with intelligent ranking. Since the native search endpoint is deprecated, this action: 1. Fetches pages from the v2 pages endpoint with pagination (up to 300 pages) 2. Applies intelligent client-side filtering with relevance scoring 3. Returns results ranked by match quality (exact phrase > all words > partial matches) The search algorithm prioritizes exact phrase matches, then checks for all query words present in the title, and finally considers partial word matches. Results are automatically sorted by relevance score for optimal user experience.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_SEARCH_USERS
capabilities.description: Searches for users using user-specific queries from the Confluence Query Language (CQL).

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_UPDATE_BLOGPOST
capabilities.description: Tool to update a Confluence blog post's title or content. Use when you need to modify an existing blog post. Ensure you have the latest version number before calling.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_UPDATE_BLOGPOST_PROPERTY
capabilities.description: Tool to update a property of a specified blog post. Use when you need to modify custom metadata on a blog post.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_UPDATE_CONTENT_PROPERTY_FOR_PAGE_BY_ID
capabilities.description: Tool to update a content property on a Confluence page. Use when you need to modify an existing metadata property by its ID.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_UPDATE_CONTENT_PROPERTY_FOR_WHITEBOARD_BY_ID
capabilities.description: Tool to update a content property on a whiteboard. Use when you need to modify metadata on a Confluence whiteboard.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_UPDATE_PAGE
capabilities.description: Tool to update an existing Confluence page. Use when you need to modify existing documentation or content.

capabilities.name: CONFLUENCE_UPDATE_SPACE_PROPERTY
